message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 3-8-1, translated into all languages

data.en: WHO support for monitoring the service coverage dimension of Universal Health Coverage (UHC) (target 3.8, indicator 3.8.1 specifically) is underpinned by Resolution WHA69 that requests the Secretariat to track progress towards achieving UHC as part of the SDG 2030 agenda for Sustainable Development.
